plot: In this special episode, the entire Kardashian family gears up for the holidays as they shoot their annual famous Christmas card photo. Plus, Kris, Bruce, Kim, Kourtney, Khloe, Rob, Kendall and Kylie all don matching black and white pajamas as they huddle up to reminisce about Christmases past and missed loved ones. Plus, they're allowing a rare glimpse at videos from Christmas parties thrown back in the '80s and '90s! Finally, don't miss the legendary Kardashian white elephant gift exchange--where the oddest presents turn into the hottest ticket items.—Anonymous
